room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: What a great room! Big with great decor to go with the theme. It was challenging and fun. We did it with a group of 3 and got out with 1:09 to spare.  Definitely a group effort for some parts.  We will be back to do their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: Fantastic time, multi room game with a very cool set design.  This a must play ....

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: This was a lot of fun.  We barely made it out in 60  minutes, and used all 3 of our hints.  The props and decor looked authentic to the early 1900s, and the sounds and music brought everything to life.  It was a lot of fun.  The ending leaves you in a rush to complete it.  Lots of fun and great for date nights.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: The titanic room was so much fun, I loved the layout and setup. My boyfriend, his parents and I and the couple that was paired with us are all planning on going back and doing another room together because we made a good team. I would recommend this place to anyone. I can't wait to go back

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: It was amazing! We were with another very friendly family and the staff was the same!The puzzles are just the right difficulty and you get a lot of adrenaline towards the end.The quality is very good with modern technology but they give it an old 1912 design and it all looks very detailed.The puzzles really make you think in different ways by using the clues around you and cooperating with your team to get out, I definitely recommend doing this

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: Me and my family had a awesome time the staff there was very kind .Our coordinator Alexus was very nice we mastered the room was a awesome experience room was great will go back again.Thanks

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: Just finished the Titanic room and it was AWESOME!!! Definitely worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: What a great experience! We escaped the Titanic before it sank! Great time and impressive setup. We'll be back soon for another adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: This was great! My third escape room so far and this was definitely my favorite! My group of 4 did the Titanic room and it was puzzling and so much fun all at the same time! Our room guide really helped us out and made the outing superb!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: The Titanic room was gorgeous and quite big compared to what I'm used to (I've done about 2 dozen rooms myself). The puzzles were fun and the effects were great. Our game master Justin had a lot of patience with my group. Not only was he articulate, he was very professional and we had a great time with him.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Titanic" by Escape It Houston in Houston
review: This escape room was amazing!! My group had such a great time and were very impressed with the attention to detail and set design! Just the right amount of challenging and loads of fun! Great to know this place is so close to home, and cannot wait to try another! Thank you!
